papers.title: Maliciously Secure Multi-party PSI with Lower Bandwidth and Faster Computation
papers.authors: Zhi Qiu, Kang Yang, Yu Yu, Lijing Zhou
papers.abstract: Private Set Intersection (PSI) allows a set of mutually distrustful parties, each holds a private data set, to compute the intersection of all sets, such that no information is revealed except for the intersection. The state-of-the-art PSI protocol (Garimella et al., CRYPTO’21) in the multi-party setting tolerating any number of malicious corruptions requires the communication bandwidth of O ( nℓ | F | ) bits for the central party P 0 due to the star architecture, where n is the number of parties, ℓ is the size of each set and | F | is the size of an exponentially large field F . When n and ℓ are large, this forms an efficiency bottleneck (especially for networks with restricted bandwidthes). In this paper, we present a new multi-party PSI protocol in dishonest-majority malicious setting, which reduces the communication bandwidth of the central party P 0 from O ( nℓ | F | ) bits to O ( ℓ | F | ) bits using a tree architecture. Furthermore, our PSI protocol reduces the expensive LPN encoding operations performed by P 0 by a factor of n as well as the computational cost by 2 nℓ hash operations in total. Additionally, while the multi-party PSI protocol (Garimella et al., CRYPTO’21) with a single output is secure, we present a simple attack against its multi-output extension, which allows an adversary to learn more information on the sets of honest parties beyond the intersection of all sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 私有集合交集(PSI)允许一组互不信任的各方(每一方持有一个私有数据集)计算所有集合的交集，这样除了交集之外没有任何信息被泄露。由于星形结构，在容许任意数量的恶意破坏的多方设置中，现有技术的PSI协议(Garimella等人，crypto’21)要求中央方P 0具有O ( nℓ | F |)比特的通信带宽，其中n是参与方的数量，ℓ是每个集合的大小，而| F |是指数大的域f的大小。当n和ℓ很大时，这形成了效率瓶颈(特别是对于带宽有限的网络)。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的在不诚实多数恶意环境下的多方PSI协议，它使用一个树形结构将中心方P 0的通信带宽从O ( nℓ | F |)比特减少到O ( ℓ | F |)比特。此外，我们的PSI协议将P 0执行的昂贵的LPN编码操作减少了n倍，并且总共减少了2次nℓ散列操作的计算成本。此外，虽然具有单输出的多方PSI协议(Garimella等人，CRYPTO’21)是安全的，但是我们提出了对其多输出扩展的简单攻击，这允许对手了解关于所有集合的交集之外的诚实方集合的更多信息。
papers.title_zh: 具有较低带宽和较快计算速度的恶意安全多方PSI

papers.title: Differentially Private Reinforcement Learning
papers.authors: Pingchuan Ma, Zhiqiang Wang, Le Zhang, Ruming Wang, Xiaoxiang Zou, Tao Yang
papers.abstract: Motivated by the wide adoption of reinforcement learning (RL) in real-world personalized services, where users' sensitive and private information needs to be protected, we study regret minimization in finite-horizon Markov decision processes (MDPs) under the constraints of differential privacy (DP). Compared to existing private RL algorithms that work only on tabular finite-state, finite-actions MDPs, we take the first step towards privacy-preserving learning in MDPs with large state and action spaces. Specifically, we consider MDPs with linear function approximation (in particular linear mixture MDPs) under the notion of joint differential privacy (JDP), where the RL agent is responsible for protecting users' sensitive data. We design two private RL algorithms that are based on value iteration and policy optimization, respectively, and show that they enjoy sub-linear regret performance while guaranteeing privacy protection. Moreover, the regret bounds are independent of the number of states, and scale at most logarithmically with the number of actions, making the algorithms suitable for privacy protection in nowadays large-scale personalized services. Our results are achieved via a general procedure for learning in linear mixture MDPs under changing regularizers, which not only generalizes previous results for non-private learning, but also serves as a building block for general private reinforcement learning.
papers.abstract_zh: 受强化学习在现实个性化服务中的广泛应用的启发，我们研究了差分隐私约束下有限时域马尔可夫决策过程中的后悔最小化问题。与现有的私有RL算法相比，现有的私有RL算法只适用于表格形式的有限状态、有限动作MDP，我们在具有大的状态和动作空间的MDP中迈出了隐私保护学习的第一步。具体来说，我们在联合差分隐私(JDP)的概念下考虑具有线性函数逼近的MDPs(特别是线性混合MDPs ),其中RL代理负责保护用户的敏感数据。我们设计了两个分别基于值迭代和策略优化的私有RL算法，并证明了它们在保证隐私保护的同时具有次线性后悔性能。此外，后悔界限与状态数无关，最多与动作数成对数关系，这使得该算法适用于当今大规模个性化服务中的隐私保护。我们的结果是通过线性混合MDPs在变化的正则项下的一般学习过程实现的，它不仅推广了非私有学习的先前结果，而且也作为一般私有强化学习的构建块。

papers.title: Generic Construction of Audit Logging Schemes with Forward Privacy and Authenticity
papers.authors: Shoichi Hirose
papers.abstract: In this paper, audit logging schemes with forward privacy and authenticity are formalized in the symmetric-key setting. Then, a generic audit logging scheme with forward privacy and authenticity is proposed. It consists of a symmetric encryption scheme and a MAC function. It also uses a forward-secure pseudorandom generator to achieve forward security. Finally, the forward privacy and authenticity of the scheme are confirmed in the manner of provable security. The security properties of the proposed scheme are reduced to the standard security properties of the underlying primitives.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文在对称密钥环境下形式化描述了具有前向保密性和真实性的审计日志方案。然后，提出了一种具有前向保密性和真实性的通用审计日志方案。它由对称加密方案和MAC函数组成。它还使用前向安全伪随机发生器来实现前向安全性。最后，以可证安全的方式证明了方案的前向保密性和真实性。所提出的方案的安全属性被简化为底层原语的标准安全属性。

papers.title: An Efficiency Optimization Scheme for the On-the-Fly Statistical Randomness Test
papers.authors: Jiahui Shen, Tianyu Chen, Lei Wang, Yuan Ma
papers.abstract: The randomness of random number generators (RNGs) significantly influences the security of cryptographic systems. Although RNGs are allowed to adopt in practical systems only after strict analysis and security evaluation, the randomness of generated sequences may degrade due to aging effects of electronic devices, change of temperature and humidity, or even malicious attacks. Therefore, before the generated sequence being used (as a secret key or any other critical cryptography parameter), it is necessary to execute the on-the-fly statistical randomness test (on-the-fly test) on the candidate sequence to ensure the security. On-the-fly test should be finished efficiently; otherwise, it would impact the cryptographic systems' performance. In this paper, we propose a scheme to optimize the efficiency of randomness test suites, that is, provide an optimized order of the tests in the test suite, so that an unqualified sequence can be rejected as early as possible. We apply this optimization scheme on the NIST test suite (SP 800-22) [1] as an instance. Experimental results of 128- and 256- bit sequence, demonstrate that the optimized efficiency approximates to the theoretical optimum and the scheme can be quickly implemented.
papers.abstract_zh: 随机数发生器的随机性对密码系统的安全性有很大影响。虽然RNG只有经过严格的分析和安全评估才被允许在实际系统中采用，但由于电子设备的老化效应、温度和湿度的变化，甚至恶意攻击，生成序列的随机性可能会下降。因此，在使用生成的序列(作为密钥或任何其他关键的密码学参数)之前，有必要对候选序列执行即时统计随机性测试(即时测试)以确保安全性。动态测试应高效完成；否则，会影响密码系统的性能。本文提出了一种优化随机测试集效率的方案，即在测试集中提供一个优化的测试顺序，从而尽可能早地拒绝不合格的序列。作为一个实例，我们在NIST测试集(SP 800-22) [1]上应用了这个优化方案。128位和256位序列的实验结果表明，优化后的效率接近理论最优值，并且该方案可以快速实现。
papers.title_zh: 动态统计随机性测试的效率优化方案

papers.title: Publicly Verifiable Data Transfer and Deletion Scheme for Cloud Storage
papers.authors: Changsong Yang, Jianfeng Wang, Xiaoling Tao, Xiaofeng Chen
papers.abstract: With the rapid development of cloud storage, more and more resource-constraint data owners can employ cloud storage services to reduce the heavy local storage overhead. However, the local data owners lose the direct control over their data, and all the operations over the outsourced data, such as data transfer and deletion, will be executed by the remote cloud server. As a result, the data transfer and deletion have become two security issues because the selfish remote cloud server might not honestly execute these operations for economic benefits. In this article, we design a scheme that aims to make the data transfer and the transferred data deletion operations more transparent and publicly verifiable. Our proposed scheme is based on vector commitment (VC), which is used to deal with the problem of public verification during the data transfer and deletion. More specifically, our new scheme can provide the data owner with the ability to verify the data transfer and deletion results. In addition, by using the advantages of VC, our proposed scheme does not require any trusted third party. Finally, we prove that the proposed scheme not only can reach the expected security goals but also can satisfy the efficiency and practicality.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着云存储的快速发展，越来越多资源受限的数据所有者可以采用云存储服务来减少沉重的本地存储开销。然而，本地数据所有者失去了对其数据的直接控制，所有对外包数据的操作，如数据传输和删除，都将由远程云服务器执行。因此，数据传输和删除成为两个安全问题，因为自私的远程云服务器可能不会为了经济利益而诚实地执行这些操作。在本文中，我们设计了一个方案，旨在使数据传输和传输的数据删除操作更加透明和可公开验证。我们提出的方案基于向量承诺(VC ),用于处理数据传输和删除过程中的公开验证问题。更具体地说，我们的新方案可以为数据所有者提供验证数据传输和删除结果的能力。此外，利用VC的优势，我们提出的方案不需要任何可信的第三方。最后，我们证明了该方案不仅能够达到预期的安全目标，而且能够满足高效性和实用性。
papers.title_zh: 云存储中可公开验证的数据传输和删除方案

papers.title: Attack Trees in Isabelle
papers.authors: Florian Kammüller
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present a proof theory for attack trees. Attack trees are a well established and useful model for the construction of attacks on systems since they allow a stepwise exploration of high level attacks in application scenarios. Using the expressiveness of Higher Order Logic in Isabelle, we succeed in developing a generic theory of attack trees with a state-based semantics based on Kripke structures and CTL. The resulting framework allows mechanically supported logic analysis of the meta-theory of the proof calculus of attack trees and at the same time the developed proof theory enables application to case studies. A central correctness and completeness result proved in Isabelle establishes a connection between the notion of attack tree validity and CTL. The application is illustrated on the example of a healthcare IoT system and GDPR compliance verification.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文给出了攻击树的一个证明理论。攻击树是构建系统攻击的一种成熟而有用的模型，因为它们允许逐步探索应用场景中的高级攻击。利用Isabelle中高阶逻辑的表达能力，我们成功地开发了基于Kripke结构和CTL的基于状态语义的攻击树的一般理论。由此产生的框架允许对攻击树的证明演算的元理论进行机械支持的逻辑分析，同时开发的证明理论使得能够应用于案例研究。在Isabelle中证明的中心正确性和完整性结果在攻击树有效性的概念和CTL之间建立了联系。该应用以医疗保健物联网系统和GDPR合规性验证为例进行了说明。
